name: Population cohort
definition: Study done at the population level or among the population groups

name: Case-control
definition: A case-control study design compares two groups of subjects: those with the disease or condition under study (cases) and a very similar group of subjects who do not have the disease or condition (controls).

name: Case only
definition: A case-only cohort gathers data from subjects with a disease or condition.

name: Birth cohort
definition: A cohort study for which the subjects are followed from the time of birth usually including information about gestation and follow up.
